GV05brupsb3u:3: āgamopapattī hyātmaikatvaprakāśanāya pravṛtte śaknutaḥ karatalagatabilvamiva darśayitum /
GV05brupsb3u:7: prasiddho hyupāyo vidvadbhiḥ śāstreṣu ca dṛṣṭo dānam /
GV05brupsb3u:11: api ca tadvidyasaṃyogastaiśva saha vādakaraṇaṃ vidyāprāptyupāyo nyāyavidyāyāṃ dṛṣṭaḥ /
GV05brupsb3u:18: tatra ha kurupañcālānāṃ brāhmaṇā abhisametā babhūvuḥ |
GV05brupsb3u:19: tasya ha janakasya vaidehasya vijijñāsā babhūva -- kaḥ svid eṣāṃ brāhmaṇānām anūcānatama iti |
GV05brupsb3u:21: daśadaśa pādā ekaikasyāḥ śṛṅgayor ābaddhā babhūvuḥ || BrhUp_3,1.1 ||
GV05brupsb3u:23: BrhUpBh_3,1.1 janako nāma ha kila samrāḍrājā babhūva videhānāṃ tatra bhavo vaidehaḥ /
GV05brupsb3u:24: sa ca bahudakṣiṇena yajñena śākhāntaraprasiddho vā bahudakṣiṇo nāma yajño 'śvamedho vā dakṣiṇābāhulyādbahudakṣiṇa ihocyate teneje 'yajat /
GV05brupsb3u:25: tatra tasminyajñe nimantritā darśanakāmā vā kurūṇāṃ deśānāṃ pañcālānāṃ ca brāhmaṇāsteṣu hi viduṣāṃ bāhulyaṃ prasiddhamabhisametā abhisaṃgatā babhūvuḥ /
GV05brupsb3u:26: tatra mahāntaṃ vidvatsamudāyaṃ dṛṣṭvā tasya ha kila janakasya vaidehasya yajamānasya ko nu khalvatra brahmiṣṭha iti viśeṣeṇa jñātumicchā vijijñāsā babhūva /
GV05brupsb3u:28: kaḥsvitko nu khalveṣāṃ brāhmaṇānāmanūcānatamaḥ sarva ime 'nūcānāḥ kaḥsvideṣāmatiśayenānūcāna iti /
GV05brupsb3u:29: sa hānūcānatamaviṣayotpannijijñāsaḥ saṃstadvijñānopāyārthaṃ gavāṃ sahasraṃ prathamavayasāmavarurodha goṣṭhe 'varodhaṃ kārayāmāsa /
GV05brupsb3u:32: daśa daśa pādā ekaikasyā goḥ śṛṅgayorābaddhā babhūvuḥ /
GV05brupsb3u:36: tān hovāca -- brāhmaṇā bhagavanto yo vo brahmiṣṭhaḥ sa etā gā udajatām iti |
GV05brupsb3u:38: atha ha yājñavalkyaḥ svam eva brahmacāriṇam uvāca -- etāḥ saumyodaja sāmaśravā3 iti |
GV05brupsb3u:40: te ha brāhmaṇāś cukrudhuḥ: -- kathaṃ nu no brahmiṣṭho bruvīteti |
GV05brupsb3u:41: atha ha janakasya vaidehasya hotāśvalo babhūva |
GV05brupsb3u:42: sa hainaṃ papraccha -- tvaṃ nu khalu no yājñavalkya brahmiṣṭho 'sī3 iti |
GV05brupsb3u:43: sa hovāca -- namo vayaṃ brahmiṣṭhāya kurmo gokāmā eva vayaṃ sma iti |
GV05brupsb3u:44: taṃ ha tata eva praṣṭuṃ dadhre hotāśvalaḥ || BrhUp_3,1.2 ||
GV05brupsb3u:47: he brāhmaṇā bhagavanta ityāmantratha yo vo yuṣmākaṃ brahmiṣṭhaḥ sarve yūyaṃ brahmāṇo 'tiśayena yuṣmākaṃ brahmā yaḥ sa etā gā udajatāmutkālayatu svagṛhaṃ prati /
GV05brupsb3u:48: te ha brāhmaṇā na dadhṛṣuḥ ha kilaivamuktā brāhmaṇā brahmiṣṭhatāmātmanaḥ pratijñātuṃ na dadhṛpurna pragalbhāḥ saṃvṛttāḥ /
GV05brupsb3u:49: apragalbhabhūteṣu brāhmaṇeṣvatha ha yājñavalkyaḥ svamātmīyameva brahmacāriṇamantevāsinamuvāca- etā gā he somyodajodgamayāsmadgṛhān prati,
GV05brupsb3u:50: he sāmaśravaḥ- sāmavidhiṃ hi śṛṇotyator'yāccaturvedo yājñavalkyaḥ /
GV05brupsb3u:53: iti te ha cukrudhuḥ kruddhavanto brāhmaṇāḥ /
GV05brupsb3u:54: teṣāṃ krodhābhiprāyamācaṣṭe- kathaṃ no 'smākaṃ ekaikapradhānānāṃ brahmiṣṭho 'smīti bruvīteti /
GV05brupsb3u:55: atha haivaṃ kruddheṣu brāhmaṇeṣu janakasya yajamānasya hotā ṛtvigaśvalo nāma babhūva āsīt /
GV05brupsb3u:56: sa enaṃ yājñavalkyam, brahmiṣṭhābhimānī rājāśrayatvāccadhṛṣṭaḥ, yājñavalkyaṃ papraccha pṛṣṭavān /
GV05brupsb3u:57: katham? tvaṃ nu khalu no yājñavalkya brahmiṣṭho 'sī 3 iti /
GV05brupsb3u:59: sa hovāca yājñavalkyaḥ- namaskarmo vayaṃ brahmiṣṭhāya, idānīṃ gokāmāḥ smo vayamiti /
GV05brupsb3u:60: taṃ brahmiṣṭhapratijñaṃ santaṃ tata eva brahmiṣṭhapaṇasvīkaraṇāt praṣṭuṃ dadhre dhṛtavān mano hotā aśvalaḥ //2//
GV05brupsb3u:63: yājñavalkyeti hovāca -- yad idaṃ sarvaṃ mṛtyunāptaṃ sarvaṃ mṛtyunābhipannaṃ kena yajamāno mṛtyor āptim atimucyata iti |

GV05brupsb3u:69: tatra madhukāṇḍe pāḍaktena karmaṇā darśanasaptuccitena yajamānasya mṛtyoratyayo vyākhyāta udgīthaprakaraṇe saṅkṣepataḥ /
GV05brupsb3u:71: yadidaṃ sādhanajātam asya karmaṇa ṛtvigagnyādi mṛtyunā karmalakṣaṇena svābhāvikāsaṅgasahitena āptaṃ jyāptam,
GV05brupsb3u:72: na kevalaṃ vyāptamabhiṣannaṃ ca mṛtyunā baśīkṛtaṃ ca /
GV05brupsb3u:73: kena darśanalakṣaṇena sādhanena yajamāno mṛtyorāptimati mṛtyugacaratvam atikramya mucyate svatantro mṛtyoravaśo bhavatītyarthaḥ /
GV05brupsb3u:79: ityucyate-vāgvai yajñasya yajamānasya“yajño vai yajamānaḥ“iti śruteḥ /

GV05brupsb3u:87: tadetadāha-sa muktiḥ sa hotā agnirmuktiḥ, agnisvarūpadarśanameva muktiḥ /

GV05brupsb3u:91: sā atimuktiḥ-yaiva ca muktiḥ sātimuktiḥ, atimuktisādhanamityarthaḥ /
GV05brupsb3u:92: sādhanadvayasya paricchinnasya yā adhidevatārūpeṇāparicchinnenāgnirūpeṇa dṛṣṭiḥ, sā muktiḥ /
GV05brupsb3u:96: tasyā atimuktermuktireva sādhanamiti kṛtvā sā atimuktirityāha /
GV05brupsb3u:98: tatra sāmānyena mukhyaprāṇadarśanamātraṃ muktisādhanamuktam, na tadviśeṣaḥ /
GV05brupsb3u:104: yājñavalkyeti hovāca -- yad idaṃ sarvam ahorātrābhyām āptaṃ sarvam ahorātrābhyām abhipannaṃ kena yajamāno 'horātrayor āptim atimucyata iti |
GV05brupsb3u:107: tad yad idaṃ cakṣuḥ so 'sāv ādityaḥ |
GV05brupsb3u:112: tasya karmaṇaḥ sāsaṅgasya mṛtyorāśrayabhūtānāṃ darśapūrṇamāsādikarmasādhanānāṃ yo vipariṇāmahetuḥ kālaḥ,
GV05brupsb3u:113: tasmāt kālāt pṛthagatinuṣṭhānavyatirekeṇāpi prāgūrdhvaṃ ca kriyāyāḥ sādhanavipariṇāmahetutvena vyāpāradarśanāt kālasya /
GV05brupsb3u:117: tatrāhorātrādilakṣaṇāttāvadatimuktimāha - ahorātrābhyāṃ hi sarvaṃ jāyate vardhate vinaśyati ca,
GV05brupsb3u:121: yajamānasya cakṣuradhvaryuśca sādhanadvayamadhyātmādhibhūtaparicchedaṃ hitvā adhidaivatātmanā dṛṣṭaṃ yat sa muktiḥ so 'dhvaryurādityabhāvena dṛṣṭo muktiḥ /
GV05brupsb3u:127: yājñavalkyeti hovāca -- yad idaṃ sarvaṃ pūrvapakṣāparapakṣābhyām āptaṃ sarvaṃ pūrvapakṣāparapakṣābhyām abhipannaṃ kena yajamānaḥ pūrvapakṣāparapakṣayor āptim atimucyata iti |
GV05brupsb3u:130: tad yo 'yaṃ prāṇaḥ sa vāyuḥ sa udgātā |

GV05brupsb3u:140: prāṇāvāyucandramasāmekatvāccandramasā vāyunā copasaṃhāre na kaścid viśeṣaḥ /
GV05brupsb3u:142: api ca vāyunimittau hi vṛddhikṣayau candramasaḥ /
GV05brupsb3u:143: tena tithyādilakṣaṇasya kālasya karturapi kārayitā vāyuḥ /

GV05brupsb3u:149: yājñavalkyeti hovāca -- yad idam antarikṣam anārambaṇam iva kenākrameṇa yajamānaḥ svargaṃ lokam ākramata iti |
GV05brupsb3u:152: tad yad idaṃ manaḥ so 'sau candraḥ sa brahmā sa muktiḥ sātimuktir ity atimokṣā |
GV05brupsb3u:156: so 'timucyamānaḥ kenāvaṣṭambhena paricchedaviṣayaṃ mṛtyumatotya phalaṃ prāpnotyatimucyata ityucyate /
GV05brupsb3u:157: yadidaṃ prasiddhamantarikṣamākāśo 'nārambaṇamanālambanamivaśabdādastyeva tatrā'lambanaṃ tattu na jñāyata ityabhiprāyaḥ /
GV05brupsb3u:160: yenāvaṣṭambhenā'krameṇa yajamānaḥ karmaphalaṃ pratipadyamāno 'timucyate kiṃ taditi praśnaviṣaya /
GV05brupsb3u:161: kenā'krameṇa yajamānaḥ svargaṃ lokamākramata iti svargaṃ lokaṃ phalaṃ prāpnotyatimucyata ityarthaḥ /
GV05brupsb3u:163: tatrādhyātmaṃ yajñasya yajamānasya yadidaṃ prasiddhaṃ manaḥ so 'sau candro 'dhidaivatam /

GV05brupsb3u:166: tena candramasā manasāvalambanena karmaphalaṃ svargaṃ lokaṃ prāpnotyatimucyata ityabhiprāyaḥ /
GV05brupsb3u:169: sarvāṃṇi hi darśanaprakārāṇi yajñāṅgaviṣayāṇyasminnavasara uktānīti kṛtvopasaṃhāra ityatimokṣāḥ /
GV05brupsb3u:173: saṃpannāma kenacitsāmānyenāgnihotrādīnāṃ karmaṇāṃ mahatāṃ phalavatāṃ tatphalāya saṃpādanaṃ saṃpat /
GV05brupsb3u:174: phalasyaiva vā sarvotsāhena phalasādhanānuṣṭhāne prayatatāṃ kenacidvaiguṇyenāsaṃbhavaḥ /
GV05brupsb3u:175: tadidānīmāhitāgniḥ sanyatkiñcitkarmāgnihotrādīnāṃ yathāsaṃbhavamādāyā'lambanīkṛtya karmaphalavidvattāyāṃ satyāṃ yatkarmaphalakāmo bhavati tadeva saṃpādayati /
GV05brupsb3u:176: anyathā rājasūyāśvamedhapuruṣamedhasarvamedhalakṣaṇānāmadhikṛtānāṃ traivarṇikānāmapyasaṃbhavasteṣāṃ tatpāṭhaḥ svādhyāyārtha eva kevalaḥ syāt /
GV05brupsb3u:178: tasmātteṣāṃ sepadaiva tatphalaprāptistasmātsaṃpadāmapi phalavattvamataḥ saṃpada ārabhyante //6//
GV05brupsb3u:181: yājñavalkyeti hovāca -- katibhir ayam adyargbhir hotāsmin yajñe kariṣyatīti |

GV05brupsb3u:193: puronuvākyāca-prāgyāgaphālād yāḥ prayujyante ṛcaḥ, sā ṛgjātiḥ puronuvākyetyucyate /
GV05brupsb3u:194: yāgārthaṃ yāḥ prayujyante ṛcaḥ, sā ṛgjātiryājyā /
GV05brupsb3u:195: śastrārthaṃ yāḥ prayujyante ṛcaḥ, sā ṛgjātiḥ śasyā /

GV05brupsb3u:208: yā hutā atinedante pitṛlokam eva tābhir jayati |

GV05brupsb3u:217: yā hutā adhiśerate 'dhyādho gatvā bhūmeradhiśerate payaḥsomāhutayaḥ /
GV05brupsb3u:218: kiṃ tābhirjayatīti, tābhirevaṃ nirvartitābhirāhutibhiḥ kiṃ jayatīti /

GV05brupsb3u:221: tena sāmānyena yā mayatā ujjvalantya āhutayo nirvartyamānāstā etāḥ sākṣāddevalokasya karmaphalasyarūpaṃ devalokākhyaṃ phalameva mayā nirvartyata ityevaṃ sampādayati /
GV05brupsb3u:222: yā hutā atinedante āhutayaḥ pitṛlokameva tābhirjayati kutsitaśabdakartṛtvasāmānyena /

GV05brupsb3u:585: dṛṣṭaṃ hyanyaśaktitvena nirjñātānāmapi padārthānāṃ viṣadadhyādīnāṃ vidyāmantraśarkarādisaṃyuktānāmanyaviṣaye sāmathyam /
